p.k: A malevolent clan, probably from Calabria, has arrived in Salento to conquer the territory. Commissioner Pasquale Zagaria (Lino Banfi) is a policeman
A malevolent clan, probably from Calabria, has arrived in Salento to conquer the territory. Commissioner Pasquale Zagaria (Lino Banfi) is a policeman
An inspector newly transferred to the small Mont Blanc region has been given a strange case, of a man whose body was trapped in the ice for 15 years
January 1943. France is under occupation. Louise is 70, and in her bar, everyone likes to forget about the war. Her serenity is disturbed, however
In the climax of political turmoil in France between republicans and Catholics, a young teacher and a fierce activist fall in love and marry
1953. A Russian soldier stationed in Poland falls in love with a local girl. Their forbidden romance turns them into traitors to their countries
After a tragic car crash and losing the baby she was expecting, Betty seeks solace in a new job looking after a blind kid in a mountain house
Karen takes her little girl to welcome her husband, Rex, who has just been released from prison after twelve years. Driving to their seaside home
Flashbacks tell the story from the moment Karen is drawn into the extraordinary world of Biba and Rex to reveal the dark and harrowing secrets she hides now
Hvozdíková (Dana Cerná) visits Kuneš (Hynek Cermák) in his cottage. She tells him that his return to Prague depends on his success in the Wágnerová case
The body of a woman showing signs of ritual violence is discovered in a flooded quarry. The circumstances of the murder are suspiciously identical
An influential and controversial businessman is shot. The shooter is Milan Smrček, a former soldier in Afghanistan, the son of the man found
Petr is under arrest, and his corruption case against the city's political and economic elite is about to fall. After threats against his life
Trying to conceive a second child, Giulio (Adriano Giannini) discovers he is infertile and suspects his wife, Veronica (Serena Autieri)
